resources.string: This sample app uses your geolocation to retrieve the 10 closest restaurants from Yelp API. This is an excerise of MVVM Design pattern and architecture! You may swipe down at any moment to refresh the page. You are able to sort by name, distance or rating by selecting the menu button at the top right corner. Selecting any of the restaurants will take you to a detail page!

You may swipe down at any moment to refresh the page. You are able to sort by name, distance or rating by selecting the menu button at the top right corner. Selecting any of the restaurants will take you to a detail page!
We need your location in order to find the closest restaurants!
